content: Puoi giocare a Go usando qualsiasi cosa tu abbia, come fiches da poker, perline, bottoni, monete, ecc. Non Ã¨ necessario utilizzare le pietre Go.
translations: eng:You can play Go using whatever you have, such as poker chips, beads, buttons, coins, etc. You do not need to use Go ston
